Development of an Artificial Intelligence (AI) Action Plan

The document provides recommendations on advancing American AI leadership, promoting competition with China, and mitigating AI risks. The CSET Center for Security and Emerging Technology submitted these recommendations in response to a Presidential Executive Order.

Key Concepts:

  • American AI leadership
  • Research investments
  • Talent development
  • Competition in AI with China
  • Promoting competition in AI development
  • Protecting small AI firms
  • Maintaining open product distribution
  • Monitoring industry partnerships
AI Artificial Intelligence Cybersecurity Biosecurity open access CSPs AI development distribution channels self-preferencing bundling
